title: Fable Anniversary
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Spanish, and Portuguese.  As the best-selling RPG on the original Xbox, Fable pioneered every player’s choice having a consequence. With Fable Anniversary, a spectacular HD remaster of the original Fable, players will be reminded of why the franchise is so special and unique. All new textures and 3D models, an entirely new lighting system, a slick new interface, achievements, and all of the content from “The Lost Chapters,” make Fable Anniversary the definitive Fable experience for faithful fans and new players alike!

childDownloads.title: Bright Platemail Armour Helmet
childDownloads.description: The armour that should only truly adorn a 'good' Hero. Now is your opportunity to dress up as the kind of Hero that will save damsels in distress, rescue a Princess from a Castle, or perhaps even help a chicken cross the road. With your boot, of course.

childDownloads.title: Bright Platemail Armour Suit

childDownloads.title: Chicken Chaser T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Do you chase chickens? What better way to show it, than through the medium of T-Shirt.

childDownloads.title: Chicken Chaser T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Do you chase chickens? What better way to show it, than through the medium of T-Shirt.

childDownloads.title: Chicken Outfit
childDownloads.description: When you become tired of kicking chickens, you can always dress up as one. Now is your opportunity to see how being kicked really feels, in this rather wonderful Chicken Outfit.

childDownloads.title: Chicken Outfit
childDownloads.description: When you become tired of kicking chickens, you can always dress up as one. Now is your opportunity to see how being kicked really feels, in this rather wonderful Chicken Outfit.

childDownloads.title: Daemon Warrior Helmet
childDownloads.description: Once worn by the Daemon Warriors themselves as war broke out between the temples of Skorm and Avo. Now is your opportunity to dress up in this famous helmet, and be thankful of the fact that the war ended almost 200 years ago.

childDownloads.title: Dark Platemail Armour
childDownloads.description: The armour most commonly worn by those that follow the 'evil' path of Skorm. Now is your opportunity to dress up as the kind of hero that will pillage entire villages, sell clothing to the same trader you stole from, or ply villagers with beer until they can't walk straight anymore.

childDownloads.title: Fable Anniversary SmartGlass Experience
childDownloads.description: Use Xbox SmartGlass to interact with Fable like never before. View the map screen, discover secret locations, compare fable 1 images and read character backstories. Please note that all text is in English only.

childDownloads.title: Fable Armoured Weapons and Outfits Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following items; Full "Obsidian Armour" Hero Outfit, Full "Leather Armour" Hero Outfit, Full "Aeon's Armour" Hero Outfit, "Blacksmithy's Bludgeoner" Greathammer Weapon, "Axel the Axe" Weapon, "Sophia's Sword" Weapon. These items can be found at the in-game shops in Bowerstone South.

childDownloads.title: Fable Creature Weapons and Outfits Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following items; Full "Wasp" Hero Outfit, Full "Minion" Hero Outfit, "Lion's Head" Hero Helmet, "The Buzzaxe" Wasp Pickaxe, "Wardog's Sword" Minion Weapon, "Hobbecaster" Hobbe Weapon, "Weapon of the Damned" Summoner's Sword, "Undead Axe" Weapon. These items can be found at the in-game shops at either Darkwood Trader Camp or Twinblade's Camp.

childDownloads.title: Fable Dave’s "Mind Crate" Hat Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following item; "Dave's Hat" Headwear. This item can be found at the in-game shop in Oakvale when you are an adult Hero.

childDownloads.title: Fable Guard Weapon and Outfit Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following items; Full "Snowspire Guard" Hero Outfit, "The Jackarse" Dead Fish Weapon. These items can be found at the in-game shops in Snowspire Village.

childDownloads.title: Fable Hero's Weapons and Outfits Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following items; Full "Thunder" Hero Outfit, Full "Whisper" Hero Outfit, Full "Guildmaster" Hero Outfit, "Rise of the Fenix" Sword, "Kraken Catcher" Giant Hook Weapon, "Big Clucking Hammer" Chicken Hammer. These items can be found at the in-game shop in the Heroes Guild.

childDownloads.title: Fable Launch Day Weapons and Outfits Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following items; Full "Scythe" Hero Outfit, Full "Bowerstone Guard" Hero Outfit, Full "Knothole Glade Guard" Hero Outfit, Full "Guild Graduate" Hero Outfit, Full "Prophets" Hero Outfit, "N.W.A. Staff" Will User's Sceptre, "The Headbanger" Lute Weapon. These items can be found at the in-game shops in the Heroes Guild or Snowspire. Please be aware that retail copies of Fable Anniversary contain a code to receive these items and you may already own it.

childDownloads.title: Fable Pirate Weapon and Outfit Pack
childDownloads.description: This additional content pack contains the following items; Full "Peirates" Pirate Hero Outfit, "Peirates" Legendary Cutlass Weapon. These items can be found at the in-game shops in Oakvale when you are an adult Hero.
